Text: Corporate CulturePete Just a quick note to see how things are going down there Im sorry to hear that Enrons on some tough times hope youre area is safe Got to love paying Andersen for their quality financial statements huh Old AA is in hot water for their FS for Enron Waste Management Inc and couple other companies Their getting some pretty bad press and rightfully deserved since all theyve tried to focus on is building up a consulting firm years before the inevitable split with Andersen Consulting Accenture On a personal side hope you Anne and the girls are doing ok Kim and I move into our new place on Monday Of course we were supposed to move in back in September but what can you do Were cutting it close to Kims due date but if she keep her legs together until after Monday we should be ok New address Ellison Avenue Bronxville NY Phone same as before Ill catch up with you later CDTF
